description: From Ancient Greek ἁπτικός (haptikós, “able to come in contact with”), from ἅπτω (háptō, “to touch”) + -ικός (-ikós, “suffix forming an adjective from a noun”).

entries.meaning: Of or relating to the sense of touch.
(computing) Of or relating to haptics (“the study of user interfaces that use the sense of touch”).
